name: 2 Hour Project Week 3 - Raccoon Spa
description:
Woah, what's this? Third week running? That almost smells like commitment.

--THIS WEEK--

I was given:

Rude word generator - @emmaahume

Sleeping - @antlerdads

Moisturiser and Coffee - @Sasha_Harvey

Text to Speech-  @TomFrostCreates

Intentional bad colour coordination - @MordanonVihl

Avocados, tinsel, mermaids - @_hollyrebecca

Sad Raccoons - @roseybit

Story:

You run a spa. A spa for a town of raccoons! Usually this is great, but today something terrible has happened. Someone has activated a rude word generator right in the middle of town, and it's insulting raccoons! The spa is so packed that raccoons are coming in and sleeping behind raccoons that are ordering! It's your job to make sure the raccoons get what they want so they can be happy, and deflect all of those mean things being said.

Controls: 

Mouse - Drag objects, delete bad words

Game:

Drag the things raccoons want onto their heads to serve them. If you're too slow they'll leave. To serve coffee/tea, grab a mug and move it over the coffee machine/teabags. If you get the wrong thing let go of the mouse to drop it. Click bad words to get rid of them, if they get too close to raccoons you lose points.

Bugs:

If the raccoon only wants 1 thing it will display an avocado at the bottom. I have no idea why, they don't want it.

Thanks for checking out my wak shit.
